tool_description: Get Full inventory of your AWS account using this API.
name: AWS Inventory
title: AWS Inventory

api_list.name: scan account
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aws-inventory1.p.rapidapi.com/scan/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aws-inventory1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
